Translations.Text: wang-gug-eul soyuhago gyesineun ha nanimkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo sillo geu bun-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneunghasim-ila
jug-eumgwa saengmyeong-eul jejeonghasieo geugeos-eulo neohuiga seon-eul haenghaneunji si heomhagoja hasini geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila

geubun-eun chilcheon-eul cheung-eulo hayeo chalyelo changjohasyeossnola neohuineun geugeos-i wanjeonmugyeolhayeo mueoshana gyeolham-ieobs-eum-eul bol geos-ini dasi hanbeon nun-euldollyeobola gyeolham-eul bol su issgessneunyo
geuleon hu dasi hanbeon nun-eul deul-eobola pigonhayeo issdeon nun-i gyeomsonha go sunjonghan silyeog-eulo dol-aolila

sillo hananim-eun gajang naj-eun ha neul-eul deungbulloseo jangsighayeossgo geu geos-eulo satan-eul mullichim-e yuyonghagehayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-eul wihae taoleuneun buljiog-ui eungbeol-eul junbihasyeossdoda
junim-eul midji anihan jadeul-eul wihaeseo saaghan eungbeol-i issnani
geudeul-i geugos-eulo deonjyeojil ttae geudeul-eun sin-eumsoli gat-eun museoun bi tan-ui solileul deul-eul geos-ila
jiog-eun bunnohayeo pogbalhal geos-ini bulsinjaui muliga deonjyeojil ttae mada neohuiege han gyeong-gojaga ileuji ani haess-eossneunyo lago suhojaga jil munhal geos-ila

sillo jeohuiege han gyeong-gojaga dolaehayeoss-euna jeohuiga geuleul geoyeog haessseubnida hananim-eun amu geosdo gye sihaji anihaessseubnida dangsindeul-eun keuge banghwanghago iss-eul ppun-ibnida lago malhadeola
deohayeo malhagil uliga gwileulgiul-yeossdamyeon ttoneun suggo haessdeolamyeon ulineun taoleuneun buljiog-ui donglyojung-e issji anihaess-eul tende lago malhadeola
geudeul-eun joeagdeul-eul gobaeghana taoleuneun buljiog-ui donglyodeullobuteo yongseoga doeji anhnola
geuleona boiji anihan junim-eul dulyeowo han jadeul-egeneun gwan-yong-gwa keun bosang-i issnola
neohuiga sumgieo malhaneun geosgwa deuleonaeeo malhaneun geosdo hananim-eun ma-eumsog-ui modeun geos-eul asim-eulo chung manhasinila
geubun-i changjohan geos-eul geubun-i moleulli issneunyo sillo geubun-eun sinbi han modeun geos-eul ihaehasigo asineun bun-isila
hananim-eun neohuileul wihae daeji leul yuyeonhage hasyeossnani gosgos-eul da nyeo bola geuligo geubun-i bepun yangsig eul seobchwihala jug-eun hueneun geubunkke lo gwiuihanola
haneul-e gyesin geubunkkeseo daeji leul heundeul-eo geugeos-i neohuileul samkyeo beo lijineun moshage hal geos-ila ansimha neunyo
animyeon haneul-e gyesin geubunkke seo neohui wie eungbeol-eul naeliji ani hal geos-ila ansimhaneunyo geuttae neohui neun naui eungbeol-i eotteohan geos-ingaleul alge doelila
sillo geudeul ijeon baegseongdeul-i naui gyeong-goleul geoyeoghaess-eul ttae geudeul wie naelyeojin naui beol-i eolmana museowoss deonyo

meoli wieseo saedeul-i nalgaeleul pyeossdaga jeob-eossda hamyeonseo meog-ileul chae lyeogo deopchineun saedeul-eul boji moshaessdeo nyo jabilousin hananim oeeneun eo neu nugudo geuleohge yujihal su eobsnani sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesim-ila
jabilousin hananim oee neo huileul doul ju-in-eun nugu-inyo sillo bulsinjadeul-eun hwansang-e ppajyeo issdeola
hananim-i yangsig-eul geodusindamyeonneohuiege nuga neohuiege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jugessneunyo geuleondedo geudeul-eunjinlieseo beos-eona omanhadoda
gogae sug-yeo geodneun jaga nasgess neunyo animyeon baleun gil-eul geodneunjaui indodoem-i nasgessneunyo

illeogalodoe neohuileul changjohasaseongjangke hago deudneun neunglyeoggwa boneun neunglyeoggwa gamgag-ui neunglyeoglwa ihaeui neunglyeog eul jusin bun-i balo hananim-isila geuleona neohuineun gamsahaji anhdeola
illeogalodoe daeji wie neohui leul beonseongke hasin bun-i hananim-isi geoneul neohui moduga geubunkkelo jibhab doenola
geuleona geudeul-eun geudaega jinsil eul malhago iss-eul ttae i yagsog-i eon je silhaengdoeneunyo lago mul-eumae
illeogalodoe geugeos-eun hananim man-i asineun geos-eulo sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja-e bulgwahanila

geuleona geudeul-i geugeos-eul gakka iseo moggyeoghal ttaemyeon bulsinjadeul-ui eol gul-eun seulpeum-eulo gadeugchal geos-imyeo geu geos-i neohuiga guhadeon ihaengdoel yagsog iyo laneun malsseum-i deullyeool geos-ila

illeogalodoe nawa geuligo na wa hamkke han jadeul-eul hananimkkeseo myeolmangke hasigeona animyeon uliege eunhyeleul bepunda hadeolado gotongseuleoun eungbeollobuteo bulsinjadeul-eul nuga gujehal su iss-eulleonji neohuiga saeng-gag hae boassneunyo
illeogalodoe geubun-eun jabilousin bun-eulo ulineun geubunman-eul mid-eu myeo geubun-egeman uitaghanani neohuineunbunmyeonghi banghwanghaessdeon jaga nugu-inji alge doelila
illeogalodoe mul-i ttangsog-eulo seumyeodeul-eo mul-eul ilhge doeeoss-eul ttae nuga neohuiege heuleuneun mul-eul gong-geubha yeo jugessneunyo

geudeul jung-e boda jeongjighaessdeon jaga wae hananim-eul chan-yanghaji ani haessneunya naega neohuiege malhaji ani haessdeonyo lago hamae

noaneun gyesoghayeo malhayeossdeolajuyeo sillo geudeul-eun jeoleul geoyeoghago geudeul-ui jaesangwa jasondeul-ege heoagman eul kkichineun jadeul-eul ttaleul ppun-ibnida
geudeul-eun keunakeun eummoleul kkumimyeo
neohui sindeul-eul beoliji malla was deudo ssuwado geuligo yagusseuwa ya ukkeu geuligo naseuleu sindeul-eul dannyeom haeseoneun anidoendago seologa seolo-e ge malhayeossdeola
geudeul-eun imi manh-eun mulileul yuhoghayeoss-euni juyeo dangsinkkeseo deo i sang banghwanghaneun jadeul-eul je-oehagoneun geudeul-ui joeag-eul jeung-gahaji anhdolog hayeo jusoseo
geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-eun igsahayeossgo buljiog-e deul-eo gage doeeoss-euni hananim oeeneun geu deul-eul doul ja amudo eobsnola
noaga malhayeossdeola juyeo dae jiwie han salamdo bulsinjalo beolyeo duji maobsoseo
dangsinkkeseo geudeul jung-e han bulsin jalado namgyeo dusindamyeon geudeul-eun dang sin-ui jongdeul-eul yuhoghayeo saaghan ja deullo mandeul geos-ibnida

juyeo jeoleul yongseohayeo jusa jeo ui bumowa mid-eum-eulo jeoui jib-e deul eoon jadeulgwa midneun salamdeulgwa midneun yeoseongdeul-eul yongseohayeo jusigo joeindeul egeman beol-eul jeung-gahayeo jusoseo
illeogalodoe naege malsseum-i gyesi doeeossgo han muliui yeongmaga kkulan-eul deudgo malhagil sillo ulineun aleumda un kkulan nangsong-eul deul-eossnola hadeola
geugeos-eun baleun gillo indohayeo ju neun geos-ini uliga geugeos-eul middoe junim-eul eotteon geosgwa biyuhaji anhnola
hananim-eun gajang widaehan junim-eu lo anaedo geuligo jasondo duji anh eusin bun-ila
uli gaunde umaehan jadeul-i iss-eo hananim-eul geoyeoghago geojishaneun ja iss-eoss-euna
ulineun salamdo yeongmado hananim kke geoyeoghago geojismalhalila saeng-gag ji ani haessnola
salamjung-e yeongmaui muliege boholeul guhaneun ja iss-euna geudeul-eun ohilyeo geudeul-ege eoliseog-eum-eul deohayeo junila
geudeul-eun neohuiga saeng-gaghaessdeus ha nanim-eun eoneu nugudo buhwalsikiji anh-eulila saeng-gaghaessdeola
uliga haneul-e ileulyeogo sidohayeoss-euna himsen suhojadeulgwa bichnaneunbyeoldeullo gadeugcha iss-eum-eul al-assnola
sillo ulineun boiji anhneun gos e anj-a sosig-eul yeosdeudgon hayeoss-euna geuleohge yeosdeul-eulyeoneun janeun yuseong-i sum-eoseo geuleul gidaligo iss-eum-eul al ge doelila
ulineun jisang-e issneun geudeul wie jaeang-i iss-eul geos-inji animyeon junimkkeseo geudeul-eul indo hasillyeonji alji moshanola
uli jung-eneun uiloun jadeul-iissgo uilobji moshan jadeul-i iss-eo ulineun daleun gil-eul ttaleugo issnola
ulineun daeji wieseo hananim eul chowolhago ttohan geubun-eul pihal su eobs-eum-eul algo issnola
ulineun bog-eum-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae geu geos-eul mid-eoss-euni junim-eul midneun ja nu gudeun eotteon sonsilgwa suchido dulyeowo haji anhnola
uli jung-e hananimkke gwiuiha neun ja issgo italhaneun ja issnani gwiuihaneun ja nugudeun olbaleun gil-eul chuguhanola
geuleona baleun gil-eseo italha neun ja geudeul-eun buljiog-ui yeonlyoga doe nila
hananim-ui malsseum-i iss-eo man-il geudeul-i baleun gil-eul geodneundamyeon naega geu deul wie pungseonghan bileul naelyeo julila
hananim-eun geuleohge hayeo geudeul-eul siheomhayeossnani junim-ui galeuchim-eul oe myeonhaneun ja issdamyeon geubun-eun geuleul go tongseuleoun eungbeolsog-e deulge halila
sawon-eun hananim-ui geos-igeoneulha nanimgwa eotteon geosdo biyuhaji malla
hananim-ui jong-i il-eona geubunkke gyeongbaehani geudeul-i tteleuljieo geu leul dulleo ssadeola
illeogalodoe sillo naneun junim man-eul gyeongbaehamyeo geubun-ege eotteon geos do biyuhaji anihanola
illeogalodoe seuseulo-ege haeag-eul kkichineun neohuileul baleungillo indo haneun geos-eun naui neunglyeog-i anila
illeogalodoe hananim-e daehanghayeo naleul bohohayeo jul eoneu nugudo-eobs-euni naneun geubun oee eotteon gos-eseodo ansigcheoleul guhal su eobsnola
sillo naneun hananim-ui gyesiwa mesejileul jeonhaneun geos ppun-eulo hana nimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul geoyeoghaneun ja boljiog-e deul-eoga geugos-eseo yeong juhalila
geudeul-eun yagsogbad-eun geos-eul boge doelini geuttae geudeul-eun nuga deo yaghanjaimyeo eoneu jjog-i yeolseingaleul al ge doelila
illeogalodoe neohuiga yagsogbad-eun eungbeol-i gakkai wassneunji animyeon ju nimkkeseo iljeong-gigan dong-an yuyehasyeossneun ji alji moshanola
hananimman-i boiji anhneun geos eul al ppun-eulo geubun-eun eoneu nugue gedo geubun-ui sinbileul allyeo juji anh eusinila
geuleona geubun-i seontaeghan seonji janeun je-oelo geubun-eun han muliui su hojadeullo hayeogeum geuui apdwileul haeng jinke hasinila

hananim-eun geudeul-i junim-ui me sejileul jeondalhayeossneunji algoja hasim imyeo ttohan geubun-eun geudeulgwa hamkke iss neun modeun sinbideul-eul ewossago gyesi myeo modeun geos-eul susjalo giloghasinila
mangtu sog-e ssayeojin geudaeyeo
bam-e il-eona yebaehala geuleonabamjung naenaega animyeo
geugeos-ui jeolban animyeon geu iha myeon doemyeo
geu isang-ilado joh-eunila geu ligo kkulan-eul nangsonghadoe neuligo li deum-eul dueo ilg-eula
naega geudaeege jung-yohan meseji leul bonaelila
sillo bamjung-e il-eonaneun geos-eun eolyeoun il-idoe yebaehago chanmihaneun mal-eul hagie gajang jeoghabhan ttaela
sillo geudaeegeneun naj-e haeyahal-immuga issnani
geudae junim-ui ileum-eul sang-gihago on jeongseong-eul dahayeo geubunman-eul seong-gila
geubun-eun dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junim-eu lo geubun oeeneun sin-i eobsnani geubun man-eul bohojalo taeghala
geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaeha go jeongjunghan taedolo geudeul-eul meollihala
geojishaneun jadeul-eun naege dula geudeullo hayeogeum hyanglagke hayeo jamsi man yuyehalila
na-egeneun geudeul-eul mukk-eul jogsoe wa geudeul-eul taeul bul-i iss-eumyeo
jilsigsikil eumsiggwa gotongseuleounbeol-i issnani
daejiwa sandeul-i keuge dong-yoha neun geunal sandeul-eun molae sandeomiga doe eo heulleo naelinila
sillo naega geudaedeul-ege han seonjijaleul bonaem-eun neohuileul wihan jeung in-i doedolog ham-ini ineun naega pa lao-ege seonjijaleul bonaen geosgwa gat nola
geuleona palaoneun geu seonjija ege bogjonghaji anihayeoss-eumae naneun geuege mugeoun eungbeol-eul naelyeossnola
neohuiga hananim-eul bujeonghandamyeon-eolin-iga hohobaegbal-i doeneun geunal neohuineun neohui jasin-eul eotteohge boho halyeo haneunyo
geuttae haneul-eun gallajigo geubun ui yagsog-eun ihaengdoenila
sillo igeos-i hanaui gyohun-i ni tteus-i issneun ja junim-ui gil-eul tta leuge hala

sillo junim-eun geudaega bam-ui sam bun-ui i ttoneun geugeos-ui ban-eul ttaeloneun sambun-ui il-eul yebaehamyeo gyeongbaehaneunji algo gyesimyeo ttohan geudaewa hamkkehan mulido geuleohanila hananimman-i bam naj-eul un-yonghasimyeo neohuiga geuleohge gyesanhal su eobs-eum-eul geubun-eun algo gye sinila geulihayeo geubun-eun neohuiege jabileul bepusyeoss-euni kkulan-eul manh-i ilg-eula neohuiege swiwojilila tto han geubun-eun neohui gaunde byeongdeunja iss go hananim-ui eunhyeleul chuguhamyeo ji sang-eul yeohaenghaneun ja iss-eumyeo hananim ui gil-eseo seongjeonhaneun ja iss-eum-eul al go gyesinani kkulan-eul manh-i ilg-eula neohuiege swiwojilila geuligo yebae leul deuligo iseullamseleul naemyeo hana nimkke joh-eun geos-eulo daebuhala neohui ga neohui yeonghon-eul wihae bachin geos-eun hananim ap-eseo deo joh-eun geos-eulo balgyeonhalini hananim-ui eunhyeleul chuguhala hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungman hasinila
mangtuleul geolchin jayeo
il-eonaseo gyeong-gohala
geuligo geudae junimman-eul chan-yanghago
geudaeui mangtuleul cheong-gyeolke hal geos imyeo
bujeonghan geos-eul pihago
pil-yo isang-ui geos-eul juji malmyeo
junim-eul wihae innaehala
napal-i buneun geuttae
geunal-eun god jaeang-ui nal-i doel geos-ila
geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos eulo pyeongtanhan geos-i anila
naega hollo changjohan geuleul naegematgila
sillo naneun geuege pungseongham-eul bepul-eo jueossgo
jasondeul-i geuwa hamkke geojuha ge hayeoss-euni
naega geuege anlaghan saenghwal-eul bepul-eossnola
geuleondedo geuneun naega deohayeo jugileul balago issneunyo
gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobsnani hananim-ui yejeungdeul-eul geoyeoghayeossnola
god naega geuege sandeomi gat-eunjaeangdeul-eul gajyeoda julila
geuneun suggohagoseodo eummoha yeoss-euni
eummohan geuege jaeang-i iss-eu lila
geuleohanila eummohaneun ja-egejaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geuleon hu geuneun saeng-gaghago
nunsal-eul jjipuligo bulkwaehan pyo jeong-eul hadeola
oemyeonhamyeo omanhae hadeola
igeos-eun yes seonjodeullobuteo yu laedoen masul-e bulgwahadago malhago
igeos-eun han ingan-ui mal-e bulgwahadago hayeossdeola
geuleomeulo naega god geuleul boljiog-eulo ileuge halila
geu buljiog-i mueos-inji mueos i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geugeos-eun amugeosdo namgiji a nihamyeon eoneu nugudo namgyeoduji a nihan gos-eulo
ingan-eul geuseulleo beolimyeo
geu wieneun yeol ahob-i issnola

hananim-eun cheonsadeul-eul buljiog-uisuhojadeullo dueossnola geu susjaleul dun geos-eun midji anihan bulsinjadeul-eul wihan silyeon-eulosseo geuligo seongseoui baegseongdeul-eul hwagsinsikigo midneun salamdeul-ui sin-ang-eul deohamyeo seongseoui baegseongdeul gwa midneun sindodeul-i uisimhaji ani hago ma-eum-i byeongdeun jadeulgwa bulsinja deul-i hananim-eun i biyulo mueos-eul uidohalyeo haneunyo lago malhaneun geu deul-eul siheomhagi wihaeseola ileohdeus hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneun jaleul bang hwangke hasa geubun-i wonhaneun jaleul indohasini geubun oeeneun eoneu nugu do junim-ui suhojadeul-eul al su eobs nola igeos-eun ingan-eul wihan gyohun-e bulgwahanila

salajyeo ganeun bam-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
bichnaneun achim-eul dugo maengseha nani
sillo geugeos-eun gajang jungdaehan jaeang jung-ui hanala
geugeos-eun ingan-eul wihan hanaui gyeong-golo
neohui jung-e apseolyeoneun jawa yuyehalyeoneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ila
modeun ingan-eun geuga haenghan haeng-wi e uihae jeodang-i doena
upyeon-ui donglyodeul-eun je-oelo
ideul-eun cheongug-eulo deul-eoga seo loga seolo-ege jilmun-eul hamyeo
joeindeul-e gwanhayeo mudgo
mueos-i neohuilo hayeogeum bulji og-e deulge hayeossneunyo lago mul-euni
geudeul-eun daedabhagil jeohuineun ye baehaneun ja jung-e issji anihayeoss-eu myeo
gananhan salamdeul-ege jaseon-eul bepulji anihago
mu-ighan jabdam-eul haneun jadeulgwa gonglon-eul hagon haess-eumyeo
simpan-ui nal-eul midji anhgo
simpan-ui nal-i ondaneun geos-eul bu inhayeossseubnikka
geulihayeo eotteon jungjaejadeul-ui jungjaedo geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshalila
gyohun-eul geoyeoghan geudeul-i eotteoh ge doeeossneunyo
geudeul-eun machi nollan dangnagwideul i
hanmaliui saja-e nolla domang chineun geosgwa gatdeola
sillo ideul gagjaneun pyeolchyeojin seongseoga geudeul-egedo naelyeojigileul wonhago issneunyo
geugeos-eun bulganeunghan geos-eulo geu deul-eun naeseleul dulyeowo haji anhnola
sillo igeos-i gyohun-ini
geugeos-eul jikilyeo haneun ja geugeos-eul gieogke halila
geuleona hananim-i wonhaneun ja oeeneun eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul gieog halyeo haji ani halila geubun-eun dulyeowo haeya hal junim-iyo gwan-yong-ui junim-isila
buhwal-ui nal-eul dugo maengsehasa
seuseulo chaegmanghaneun yeonghon-eul dugomaengsehanani
ingan-eun hananim-i geuui ppyeodeul-eulmo-eul su eobsdago saeng-gaghaneunyo
hananim-egeneun ingan-ui songalag kkeut-ui ppyeokkajido buhwalsikil su issneun gwonneung-i issnola
geulaedo ingan-eun geuui ap-e nam a issneun gigankkajido bulsinhalyeo ha myeo
buhwal-ui nal-i eonjeinyo lago muddeola
geulihayeo siyaneun hyeonhogdoego
dal-eun eodumsog-e mudhimyeo
taeyang-gwa dal-i hamkke moineun nal
eunsincheoga eodiibnikka lago geunal ingan-eun jilmunhana
geudeul-egeneun eunsincheoga eobsnola
geunal-eun junim-egeloman dol-agalgeocheo ppun-ila
geunal ingan-eun geuga apseo haenghanmodeun geosgwa hue milueojyeossdeon modeun geos-eul alge doemae
geuttae ingan-eun geuga seuseuloui jeung-in-i doenola
eotteon byeonmyeongdo geuege yuyongha ji anhnola
kkulan-eul gyesi bad-eum-e seodulleo geudaeui hyeoleul umjig-iji malla
hananim-i geugeos-eul moa geudae lo hayeogeum amsongke halini
hananim-i geugeos-eul ilg-eun hue geudaega ttala ilg-eula
geuleon hu hananim-i geugeos-eul seolmyeonghayeo julila
geuleona neohuineun jinaganeun hyeon se-ui salm-eul salanghago
naeseleul geeulli hadoda
geunal ilbuneun geudeul-ui eolgul-e bich-eul balsanhamyeo
geudeul-ui junim-eul hyanghayeo issgo
geunal ilbuneun geudeul-ui eolgul-e seulpeumgwa gonoelo gadeugchamyeo
geudeul wie eolmaui keun jaeang-i imbaghaess-eum-eul alge doedoda
geuttae yeonghon-i moggumeongkkaji i leumae
geuleul guhal masulsaga nugu-i nyo laneun soliga deullini
geuneun ibyeolhal sigan-ilaneun geos eul hwagsinhago
han daliga daleun geos-e pogaeeo jyeo
geunal junimkkelo unbandoeeo ga nola
geugeos-eun geuga hwagjeunghaji ani hago yebaeleul deuliji anihamyeo
jinlileul geoyeoghago oemyeonhaess-eumyeo
wanjeonhi gimandoen geuui mulileul omanhage ttalassgi ttaemun-ila
neohuiege jaeang-i iss-eulila
deohayeo neohuiege jaeang-i iss eulila
amu mogjeog-eobs-i banghwangtolog nae beolyeo dulila ingan-eun saeng-gaghaneunyo
geuneun danji heulleonaon jeong-aeg-ui han bang-ul-e bulgwahaji anhneunyo
geulihayeo eunghyeol-i doemae geubun eun geuleul wanjeonhan hyeongsang-eulo jieusi go
namseong-gwa yeoseong-eulo jaung-eul du syeoss-eumae
geuleohan neunglyeog-eul gajin geubun-i jug-eun jaleul salge hal su eobsdan mal-inyo
ingan-e gwanhayeo eongeubhal manhan eotteon geosdo eobs-eossdeon olaen gigan-i heulleossnola
sillo hananim-eun honhabdoen hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulosseo ingan-eul changjohasa geuleul siheomhagi wihaeseola geuliha yeo hananim-eun ingan-ege cheong-gaggwa si lyeog-eul buyeohago
gil-eul jesihayeo jueoss-eudoe in gan-i gamsahago bulsinhaneun geos-eun geu ui seontaeg-ila
geuleona bulsinjadeul-egeneun soesa seulgwa meong-ewa taoleuneun buljiog-eul junbihayeossgo
uiloun jadeul-eul wihaeseoneun geudeul-i masil kapuleuga honhabdoen sul-eul masil jan-eul junbihasyeossnola
geugeos-eun hananim-ui jongdeul-i ma sil saemmullo geudeul-i wonhaneundaelo gil leoonila
geudeul-eun yagsog-eul suhaenghayeossgo meolliseo peojyeo dagaol saaghan eotteon geunal-eul dulyeowo haess-eumyeo
geudeul-eun hananim-eul salanghayeo gananhan jawa goawa polodeul-ege meog eul eumsig-eul jegonghamyeo
ulineun hananimman-eul wihae yeoleobun-ege eumsig-eul jegonghal ppun eotteon bosang-ina gamsado wonchi anihabnida lago malhago
sillo ulineun junimkkeseo eomhago keuge noyeowo hasil eoneu nal-eul dulyeowohabnida lago hadeola
geuleona hananim-eun geunal-ui saagham-eulobuteo geudeul-eul guhasa geudeul-ege gippeumgwa haengbog-eul jusil geos-ila
ineun geudeul-i innaehayeossgi ttaemun-eulo geubunkkeseo cheonguggwa myeongjuui uisang-eulo geudeul-eul bosanghasil geos-i ni
geudeul-eun cheongug-ui nop-eun anlag-uija-e gidaeeo jag-yeolhaneun taeyang-ui yeol sawa chuwido masboji ani hanola
cheongug-ui geuneul-i geudeul wilo naelyeojyeo iss-eumyeo gwaildeul-eun geudeul-ui son i dahgie gakkaun gos-e iss-eumyeo
eungwa sujeong-eulodoen jandeul-i geu deul saileul ogago
geudeul-eun sujeong-gat-eun malg-eun eunjan e joh-eul mankeum ttala masideola
janjabil-i honhabdoen suljan-i geu deul-ege jueojigo
geugos-eneun ssalssabil-ilaneun u mul-i iss-eumyeo
geudeul juwileul doneun cheongsunhan sonyeondeul-eul neohuiga bolini neohuineun geudeul-i ppulyeonon jinjudeulcheoleom saeng-gaghalila
neohuiga geugos-eul bol ttae neohuineun geugos-eseo chugboggwa widaehan wang-gug-eul moggyeoghalila
geudeul-eun chologsaeg myeongjuwa dukkeo un geumsillo jjan myeongjuleul geolchigo eunpal jjilo jangsig-eul hago iss-eumyeo junim-eun geudeullo hayeogeum seongseuleoun eumlyosuleul masige hadeola
sillo igeos-i neohuileul wihan bo sang-eulo neohuiui nolyeog-eun icheoleom bo sangdoenila
hananim-i geudaeege dangyejeog-eu lo kkulan-eul gyesihaessnola
junim-ui myeonglyeong-e innaehago joe indeul-ina eunhyeleul moleuneun jadeul-ege gwileul giul-ijimalmyeo
achim jeonyeog-eulo junim-eul yeom-won hago
bamjung-eneun geubunkke buboghayeo gyeongbaehamyeo gin bam-eul tonghayeo geubun-eul yeong-gwangdoege hala
sillo ideul-eun jamsi jinaganeun hyeonseleul salanghal ppun gotongseuleoul eo neu nal-eun soholhi hal ppun-ila
hananim-i geudeul-eul changjohago ganghage hayeoss-euna hananim-i wonhal ttae geudeul-eul wanjeonhi daechehal su issnola
sillo igeos-i hanaui gyohun-i geoneul wonhaneun ja nugudeunji junim-eu lo ileuneun gil-eul ttaleudolog hala
neohuiga wonhaneun geos hananim-ui heolag-eobs-ineun ani doenani sillo hananim-eun asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasinila
hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneun ja leul geubun-ui eunhyesog-e deulge hasina saaghan jadeul-eul wihaeseoneun gotongseuleo un eungbeol-eul junbihasyeossnola

bunlyuhaneun geunal-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo

hananim-i geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a yes seonjodeul-eul myeolmangke hago
geudeul hue saeloun sedaeleul odolog hage haess-euni
